title: Downloading Replays Without opening the League app?
body: I am unable to open league at school but I want to show my friends my replays. So I was wondering if there was a way to download replays without going through the game itself. Any and all help is appreciated. :)

replies.body: You can by creating highlights, which will store locally on your own drive.  You'll still have to play the replay at least once to make it, though.  Check our [replays guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips) to help, but I recommend you make your highlights TODAY.  We have a patching coming up, and any previous replays will become incompatible!
